info.title: FreeFinance REST API
info.description: The REST API to be used with FreeFinance and FinanzFenster. Please read the examples for an introduction to authentication and some use cases.

tags.name: DocumentManagement
tags.description: Document management - uploading files and retrieving file content

tags.name: MasterDataCustomer
tags.description: Master data - creating and editing customers

tags.name: MasterDataSupplier
tags.description: Master data - creating and editing suppliers

tags.name: PointOfSale
tags.description: Point of Sale - handles cash register terminals, creating receipts, and managing daily closings.

get.description: Returns all bank statement headers created by the API or from PSD2.

post.description: Creates a new bank statement header. Only the header is created, lines are added in a separate call.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns a single bank statement header identified by its id.

404.description: Bank statement with this id not found.

get.description: Returns the lines of a bank statement, limited by date or number.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Only return lines with a booking date greater than or equal to this value. Must be set together with to.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Only return lines with a booking date less than or equal to this value. Must be set together with from.

parameters.name: line_number_gt
parameters.description: Only return lines with a line number greater than this value.

404.description: Bank statement with this id not found.

post.description: Creates new lines for a bank statement header. The lines will be appended and numbered automatically.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

post.description: Creates new lines for a singular bank statement header tied to a bank account. If no header exists, it will be created. If more than one header exists, an error will be returned. This resource is used for append-only single statements like PSD2.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

post.description: Creates a new rebook according to the defined rebook type. See the /accounts/rebook_accounts resource for possible accounts to use with the type.

404.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns an incoming invoice referenced by its id.

delete.description: Deletes an unpaid incoming invoice. Single-entry accounting (EA) only.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns a list of incoming invoices filtered by optional search parameters. A time span (from-to) must be set to limit results. Note that lines and bookings are not returned, use /incoming_invoices/{invoice_id} to fetch these for a single invoice.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: If the invoices should be PAID, UNPAID, or OVERDUE

post.description: Creates an incoming invoice. Accounts can be found in the /accounts resource. Note that depending on the financial settings, the invoice must be paid. Additionally, for double-entry accounting the invoice is always booked immediately.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns a single booking for an incoming invoice.
Returns all bookings for an incoming invoice.
Returns a specific journal booked from an incoming invoice. The booking need not be specified.
Returns all journals booked from an incoming invoice. The bookings need not be specified.

post.description: Cancels a specific booking for an incoming invoice. Only payment and rest payment bookings can be cancelled.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

post.description: Cancels an incoming invoice.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

post.description: Registers a payment for an incoming invoice. Partial payments are only supported in double-entry accounting.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

post.description: Registers the rest payment for an incoming invoice (like discount), which marks the invoice as paid. Double-entry accounting only.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns an outgoing invoice referenced by its id.

delete.description: Deletes an unpaid outgoing invoice. Single-entry accounting (EA) only.

get.description: Returns a list of outgoing invoices filtered by optional search parameters. A time span (from-to) must be set to limit results. Note that lines and bookings are not returned, use /outgoing_invoices/{invoice_id} to fetch these for a single invoice.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: If the invoices should be PAID, UNPAID, or OVERDUE

post.description: Creates an outgoing invoice. Accounts can be found in the /accounts resource. Note that depending on the financial settings, the invoice must be paid. Additionally, for double-entry accounting the invoice is always booked immediately.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns a single booking for an outgoing invoice.
Returns all bookings for an outgoing invoice.
Returns a specific journal booked from an outgoing invoice. The booking need not be specified.
Returns all journals booked from an outgoing invoice. The bookings need not be specified.

post.description: Cancels a specific booking for an outgoing invoice. Only payment and rest payment bookings can be cancelled.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

post.description: Registers a payment for an outgoing invoice. Partial payments are only supported in double-entry accounting.

get.description: Returns a specific account by its account number.
Returns the account balances over the specified time period, calculated as the sum of all bookings.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: Calculation method to use, default is N (net).

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Include bookings from this date onward. Defaults to beginning of this year.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Include bookings up to this date. Defaults to end of this year.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Account type code to filter (if available), examples are E (revenue), M (revenue gastronomy), A (expenses), L (assets), S (miscellaneous), U (cash, rebooks, etc.)

enum: E, A, L, W, G, Z, S, F, U, C, M, N, P, R, B

parameters.name: opening_balances
parameters.description: If opening balances should be included in the calculation

parameters.name: closing_entries
parameters.description: If closing entries should be included in the calculation

parameters.name: filterNullValues
parameters.description: Whether values that add up to 0 should be shown or not

parameters.name: dbhCreditDebit
parameters.description: Split results into credit and debit (ignored if no double-entry accounting)

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns the account balances over the specified time period, calculated as the sum of all bookings per month.

parameters.name: fiscal_year
parameters.description: The fiscal year as basis for the balance calculation

parameters.name: opening_balances
parameters.description: If opening balances should be included in the calculation

parameters.name: closing_entries
parameters.description: If closing entries should be included in the calculation

parameters.name: totals
parameters.description: If totals should be calculated for each account

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: Calculation method to use (net or total), default is N (net)

parameters.name: filterNullValues
parameters.description: Whether values that add up to 0 should be shown or not

get.description: Returns all tax class entries for an account. A tax class entry references a specific tax rate for a business document line or item.
Returns a specific tax class entry for an account.

404.description: Account or tax class entry not found.

get.description: Returns all accounts. Accounts are required for cash based invoicing and business document lines and can be optionally added to items. Every account has one or multiple tax class entries, which define the tax rate for the line.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Account type code to filter (if available), examples are E (revenue), M (revenue gastronomy), A (expenses), L (assets), S (miscellaneous), U (cash, rebooks, etc.)

enum: E, A, L, W, G, Z, S, F, U, C, M, N, P, R, B

get.description: Returns all accounts that can be used for items. This includes income, receivables and coupon accounts.
Returns all accounts that are available as the from-account in rebooks, depending on type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Rebook type: REBOOK (default), CORRECTION, FINALIZATION (for special bookings)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Effective date of accounts, defaults to today

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns all accounts that are available as the to-account in rebooks, depending on the type and from-account.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Rebook type: REBOOK (default), CORRECTION, FINALIZATION (for special bookings)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Effective date of accounts, defaults to today

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns all accounts that can be used for item lines in cash register receipts. This includes income and receivables accounts.

Returns all bank accounts.
Returns all current documents in the designated staging folder.

post.description: Creates a new document in the staging folder and uploads one or multiple files in a multipart request. The metadata body defines optional attributes to add to the document. The multipart attachment can be one file of a supported type (PDF, images) or multiple images, which are then merged into a single PDF in the backend. See the examples for a multipart request.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns a specific document and its metadata. The path parameter consists of the document provider (internal DMS, or external like Dropbox) and the provider id for the file.

parameters.name: providerId
parameters.description: Provider designated id for the document

get.description: Returns the binary data for a document.

parameters.name: providerId
parameters.description: Provider designated id for the document

post.description: Creates a new document in the staging folder and uploads a base64-encoded file. The metadata defines optional attributes to add to the document.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

post.description: Returns all unread notifications and marks them as read.

parameters.name: refresh_token
parameters.description: Current refresh token of the session.

get.description: Returns all units of measure.

post.description: Cancels a payment for a credit memo.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns all finalized and external credit memos. Documents created for staging do not have a number and are therefore not returned over the API.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Return only documents updated after this timestamp in milliseconds (Instant.now().toEpochMilli())

parameters.name: paid
parameters.description: Return only paid (true) or unpaid (false) credit memos

post.description: Creates a new credit memo. Depending on the supplied state, credit memos are either created for staging (and completed manually) or immediately finalized. Once finalized, a number is assigned and the PDF is created. If a number is coming from an external system, the EXTERNAL state and an id must be set. External documents cannot be edited and no PDF is created.

400.description: Input invalid. Further information in the RestError response.

get.description: Returns a specific credit memo by its number. Staging documents cannot be retrieved with this resource.
Returns all non-payment bookings for a specific credit memo.
Returns the current PDF document of a specific credit memo as binary data.

404.description: Credit memo or document not found.

get.description: Returns information about the current user.

statementDate.description: Date of creation or export for this bank statement.

valueDateFrom.description: Earliest date of all statement lines in the header.

valueDateTo.description: Last date of all statement lines in the header.

bankAccount.description: Bank account uuid for this statement header, see the /bank_accounts resource.

bankAccountName.description: Human readable name of the bank account for this statement header.

id.description: Uuid for this statement header.

fileName.description: File name for the bank statement header. Will be sanitized.

currencyCode.description: Currency code for the header in ISO format. Equals the currency of the bank account.

status.description: Current processing status of the header.

error.description: Name of the error or exception.

message.description: Localized, extended description of the error.

identifier.description: An alphanumeric string identifying this occurrence.

bookingDate.description: Actual booking date of the transaction, as determined by the bank.

originator.description: Name of the person or company that originated the transaction.

originatorBankReference.description: Bank reference of the person or company that originated the transaction.

originatorBankCode.description: Bank code of the person or company that originated the transaction.

originatorAccountNumber.description: Account number of the person or company that originated the transaction.

partnerName.description: Name of the person or company that received the transaction.

partnerAccountNumber.description: Account number of the person or company that received the transaction.

partnerBankCode.description: Bank code of the person or company that received the transaction.

customerData.description: Additional customer data about the transaction.

reasonForTransfer.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

reasonForTransfer1.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

reasonForTransfer2.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

reasonForTransfer3.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

reasonForTransfer4.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

reasonForTransfer5.description: Information from the originator about the reason for the transaction. Split into multiple properties as payment providers assign the reason differently and sometimes in multiple fields.

additionalText.description: Additional text supplied for the transaction.

transactionId.description: Optional, unique transaction id. Lines with duplicate transaction ids are filtered out as duplicates.

note.description: Additional note supplied for the transaction.

valueDate.description: Value date of the transaction, as submitted by the initiator.

amount.description: Total amount of the booking. Positive for credit, and negative for debit transactions.

id.description: Line number of the line, must be unique. Will be auto-numbered on import.

currencyCode.description: Currency code for the line in ISO format. Defaults to the main currency.

description.description: Description field describing the purpose of the line.

status.description: Current import status, used to determine if a line is a potential duplicate of an earlier line. Potential duplicates can be submitted by PSD2 providers, but are marked as such.

BankStatementLineDtoV1.description: Describes a bank statement line. Different, sometimes repeating, text properties map the different ways payment providers supply information about the transaction.

duplicatesCount.description: Number of lines that were detected as duplicates and skipped.

addedLines.description: All lines that were appended as a result of this operation. Only returned if returnLines in the request was set.

duplicateTransactionIds.description: A distinct list of duplicate transaction ids that were ignored. Only returned if returnLines in the request was set.

items.description: A distinct list of duplicate transaction ids that were ignored. Only returned if returnLines in the request was set.

addedCount.description: Number of lines that were created.

returnLines.description: Set to true if a list of created lines (and found duplicates) is to be included. Otherwise, only the counts will be returned.

bankStatementLines.description: The bank statement lines to append.

id.description: ID of the rebook journal.

rebookType.description: Rebook type, which limits available accounts. See the /accounts/rebook_accounts resource.

account.description: Account from which the amount was subtracted. See the /accounts resource.

contraAccount.description: Account to which the amount was added. See the /accounts resource.

cancelled.description: Indicates if this rebook has been cancelled.

cancelledReason.description: The reason for the cancellation as provided when it was cancelled.

description.description: Description or note for the rebook.

reference.description: Optional reference to an invoice, receipt, journal number, etc.

invoiceDate.description: Optional invoice date if the rebook is originating from an invoice or other business case.

currencyRate.description: Currency rate if the rebook amount was in a currency different to the main currency. Otherwise defaulted with 1.

currencyCode.description: Currency if the rebook amount was in a currency different to the main currency. See the /currencies resource.

amount.description: Total amount of the rebook in the main currency.

type.description: Rebook type, which limits available accounts. See the /accounts/rebook_accounts resource.

date.description: Date of the booking, defaulted to the current date.

amount.description: Total amount of the booking. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits. Note that these bookings have no tax.

description.description: Description or additional information for the booking.

reference.description: Text reference to other receipts, invoices, etc.

account.description: Account to subtract the amount from, Must be a valid account for the rebook type (see the /accounts/rebook_accounts resource)

contraAccount.description: Account to add the amount to. Must be a valid contra account for the rebook type and selected account. See the /accounts/{account}/rebook_contra_accounts resource.

id.description: ID of the invoice, automatically assigned.

invoiceSequence.description: Automatically assigned sequence number for booked invoices. Unpaid invoices in single-entry accounting don't have a sequence number.

invoiceDate.description: Invoice date. Required for double entry accounting and with special bookings.

dueDate.description: Optional due date of the invoice.

paidDate.description: Date the invoice was paid. When supplied at invoice creation, the invoice is marked as paid immediately, and a booking created (for single-entry accounting)

cancelledReason.description: For cancelled invoices, the reason supplied during the cancellation.

cancelledDate.description: Cancellation date. If a date is present, the invoice is treated as cancelled.

supplier.description: ID of the optional supplier, see the /suppliers resource.

supplierName.description: Name of the supplier, if no ID is provided.

invoiceReference.description: Optional reference to other receipts, invoices, etc.

description.description: Optional description for the invoice.

netTotal.description: Net amount of the invoice. Will be calculated automatically.

taxTotal.description: Tax amount of the invoice. Will be calculated automatically.

total.description: Total amount of the invoice, including tax. Will be calculated automatically.

remainingTotal.description: Unpaid remaining amount in the invoice currency.

remainingTotalInMainCurrency.description: Unpaid remaining amount in the accounting currency (usually EUR). When fully paid, the remaining amount is 0.

currency.description: Currency code of the invoice, see the /currencies resource. Defaulted with EUR.

currencyRate.description: Currency rate of the invoice. Defaulted with 1.

deliveryFromDate.description: Optional from date for a delivery span. Only available for double-entry accounting.

deliveryToDate.description: Optional to date for a delivery span. Only available for double-entry accounting.

lines.description: List of invoice lines. The supplied order of the array defines the assigned line numbers.

bookings.description: List of bookings registered with this invoice, like initial booking, payment and cancellation bookings.

note.description: Optional internal note for the invoice.

id.description: Uuid of the booking.

type.description: Type of the booking: InvoiceInitialBookingDto for bookings that were generated in cash-based accounting or with the invoice, InvoicePaymentBookingDto for payments created in double-entry accounting, and InvoiceCancellationBookingDto for bookings that cancel another booking.

number.description: Sequence number of the booking, starting with 1. Note that InvoiceCancellationBookingDto bookings share the number with the booking they cancel.

cancelled.description: Indicates if the booking was cancelled. If set, a InvoiceCancellationBookingDto exists with the same number.

reconciled.description: Indicates if this booking was reconciled with an entity from another application module. If set, the booking cannot be cancelled directly and must be cancelled from the module.

reconciliationType.description: The type of reconciliation, if it was reconciled. Currently only BANK_STATEMENT is a possible type.

journalNumber.description: The journal number of the journal generated with this booking.

InvoiceBookingDtoV1.description: List of bookings registered with this invoice, like initial booking, payment and cancellation bookings.

description.description: Description text of the line.

amount.description: The total item amount, i.e. number of units purchased. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

amountType.description: Determines if the item price is net without tax (N) or total (T). For IG/reverse charge lines, the amount type must be N.

account.description: Account code to use for this line. See the /accounts resource, and the E account type.

taxEntry.description: Tax class entry code for the tax class to use, defaulted from the account if not present. See the /accounts/{account}/tax_class_entries resource.

taxRate.description: Tax rate of the line, derived from the tax class entry.

netAmount.description: Total net amount of the line. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

taxAmount.description: Total tax amount of the line. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

totalAmount.description: Total amount (net + tax) of the line. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

privatePart.description: Private part amount as total amount or percentage. Must be set with privatePartType. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

privatePartType.description: Determines if the private part is a fixed amount (A) or a percentage (P)

privatePartAccount.description: Account code to use for the private part. Defaulted if not specified. See the /accounts resource - the account must be a private part account.

taxEntryModifier.description: Tax class entry modifier for the tax class to use for special bookings. See the /accounts/{account}/tax_class_entries resource. (Relevant only for incoming invoices)

additionalSequence.description: Additional sequence assigned to the line on creation, like an asset or purchase journal number.

InvoiceLineDtoV1.description: List of invoice lines. The supplied order of the array defines the assigned line numbers.

journalType.description: Journal type: IncomeJournal, OutgoJournal, or RebookJournal.

netTotal.description: Total net sum of the journal in the main currency.

taxTotal.description: Total tax sum of the journal in the main currency.

total.description: Total sum of the journal in the main currency.

cancelled.description: Indicates if the journal has been cancelled.

warnings.description: List of localized warnings created during the operation.

items.description: List of localized warnings created during the operation.

infos.description: List of localized reminders and information created during the operation.

items.description: List of localized reminders and information created during the operation.

cancelledReason.description: For cancelled invoices, the reason supplied during the cancellation.

remainingTotal.description: Unpaid remaining amount in the invoice currency.

remainingTotalInMainCurrency.description: Unpaid remaining amount in the accounting currency (usually EUR). When fully paid, the remaining amount is 0.

currency.description: Currency code of the invoice, see the /currencies resource. Defaulted with EUR.

currencyRate.description: Currency rate of the invoice. Defaulted with 1.

lines.description: List of invoice lines. The supplied order of the array defines the assigned line numbers.

bookings.description: List of bookings registered with this invoice, like initial booking, payment and cancellation bookings.

note.description: Optional internal note for the invoice.

deliveryFromDate.description: Optional from date for a delivery span. Only available for double-entry accounting.

deliveryToDate.description: Optional to date for a delivery span. Only available for double-entry accounting.

paymentType.description: Indicates if the payment should create a payment booking (= PAYMENT) or not, as a booking was already created manually before (= EXISTING_CREDIT). Defaults to PAYMENT.

paymentAmount.description: Total paid amount in the currency of the invoice.

paymentAmountInMainCurrency.description: Total paid amount in the accounting currency (usually EUR).

contraAccount.description: Account that made/received the payment. See the /accounts resource. Must be of the cash account type (U) and not be reserved (e.g. from a cash register).

currencyRate.description: Currency rate at the payment date. Defaulted with 1.
Currency rate if the payment is for a currency other than the main currency. Defaulted with 1.

paymentDescription.description: An optional description of the payment.

type.description: The type of payment, with only DISCOUNT and IRRECOVERABLE (for outgoing invoices) being permitted. Other types are automatically generated.

id.description: Numeric account code.

type.description: Account type code. Types are organizational groups of accounts, but have no direct impact on bookings. Examples are E (incomes) and A (outgos)

defaultTaxClassEntry.description: The code of the default tax class. If no tax class is specified, this class will be used, and if forced, only this class can be used.

forcedTaxClass.description: If the default tax class is forced, it must be set and bookings with different tax class entries are not allowed for this account.

credit.description: Account credit over the specified time period.

debit.description: Account debit over the specified time period.

sum.description: Account sum over the specified time period.

accountClass.description: Class to which this account belongs, defined as accounting group. This is usually based on the first number of the account code.

openingBalance.description: The opening balance of the account. Is only returned when opening_balances was set in the request.

balanceSum.description: The closing balance of the account. Is only returned when closing_entries was set in the request.

totalSum.description: The total sum of the account. Is only returned when totals was set in the request.

id.description: The tax class entry code to be used in invoices, receipts, etc.

taxRate.description: Numeric tax rate of the tax class entry.

taxClassEntryModifierList.description: List of available tax class modifiers. Only relevant for outgoing invoices.

id.description: ID to use when specifying a modifier in incoming invoices.

TaxClassModifierDtoV1.description: List of available tax class modifiers. Only relevant for outgoing invoices.

id.description: Unique id for this bank account.

name.description: Human-readable name for this bank account.

bic.description: BIC code of the account. Only present for bank accounts.

iban.description: IBAN of the account. Only present for bank accounts.

accountCode.description: Account code for the account tied to this bank account, see /accounts resource.

accountUserDescription.description: Human-readable description of the account tied to this bank account, if present.

currencyCode.description: Currency code for the account in ISO format. Defaults to EUR.

shown.description: Indicates if this bank account is displayed (true) or hidden from the GUI (false).

BankAccountDtoV1.description: A bank account represents a payment account. These are usually bank accounts, but can also include credit card and cash payment accounts.

providerId.description: The ID which identifies this particular document to the provider.

provider.description: Provider type, i.e. where the file is stored. DMS is the app-internal storage, all others are external cloud storage providers.

DocumentKeyDtoV1.description: Document key identifying this document to the storage layer.

textValue.description: Only one value type must be present.

key.description: A key describing the content of this field.

priority.description: A number expressing the confidence or accuracy of the metadata, ranging between 1 and 255 with 1 being the highest.

numericValue.description: Only one value type must be present.

qualifier.description: A number describing if this metadata value belongs to a subgroup of information, for example a specific line of an invoice.

booleanValue.description: Only one value type must be present.

dateValue.description: Only one value type must be present.

DocumentMetadataDtoV1.description: A list of metadata to include with the new document.

metadata.description: A list of all metadata attached to the document.

fileName.description: File name of the document. Will be sanitized and stripped of special characters. Whitespace will be replaced with underscores.

skipOcr.description: If set to true, this document will not be processed automatically by OCR services.

documentDescription.description: An optional description of the document itself. Will be shown as additional information and used for search.

metadata.description: A list of metadata to include with the new document.

content.description: Base64-encoded binary content of the document.

contentType.description: MIME type of the document. Accepted are images, text/plain and application/pdf, all other types will be replaced by octet-stream.

skipOcr.description: If set to true, this document will not be processed automatically by OCR services.

documentDescription.description: An optional description of the document itself. Will be shown as additional information and used for search.

metadata.description: A list of metadata to include with the new document.

id.description: 2-letter country code.
Code of the region to be used for customers and suppliers.
Short code as identifier to be used in currency fields.

CurrencyDtoV1.description: Currencies to be used in items, receipts, and business documents.

sender.description: Name of the sender, if the message came from the communication platform, or the application name if it came as a system notification.

dateTime.description: Time when then notification was created.

name.description: Short, human-readable keyName for this unit.

id.description: Short code as identifier to be used in UOM-fields.

description.description: Optional longer description.

UnitOfMeasureDtoV1.description: Units of measure to be used in items, receipts, and business documents.

id.description: Uuid of this payment history entry.

note.description: User-entered note for this payment event.

amount.description: Total amount that was subtracted from the payable document.

cancelled.description: If set, the payment event was cancelled.

payingAccount.description: Account used for the payment. See the /accounts resource.

cashRegisterId.description: Cash register id, if a cash register was used for the payment.See the /cash_registers resource.

receiptId.description: Receipt id, if a receipt was created for the payment.See the /receipts resource.

receiptQrCode.description: Machine-readable code of the RKSV data for the receipt.

cancellationOfPayment.description: If this is a cancellation, this flag indicates if the cancelled payment was an actual payment (true) or just a cancellation of rest amounts (false)

salutationCode.description: Salutation code for a contact as person.

title.description: Title if the contact references a person.

firstName.description: First name if the contact references a person. Required unless a company name is supplied.

lastName.description: Last name if the contact references a person. Required unless a company name is supplied.

compSalutationCode.description: Salutation code for a contact as a company.

companyName.description: Company name for a company contact. Required unless a first and last name are supplied.

streetName.description: Street name of the address, excluding the number.

streetNumber.description: Street number of the address. May include special characters to designate floor etc.

emailAddress.description: E-mail address belonging to the contact.

copyEmailAddress.description: E-mail address belonging to the contact.

copyEmailType.description: E-mail address belonging to the contact.

country.description: Country code of the address. See the /countries resource for all available countries and their codes. Defaulted to AT.

region.description: Region code of the address, depending on country. See the /countries/{country}/regions resource for all available regions and their codes.

AddressInfoDtoV1.description: Specific customer name and address for this document only. If set (with company name and/or customer name), no defaults from customer or address are applied.

id.description: Line number, automatically assigned based on order of creation.

name.description: Short name identifying the item of this line.

description.description: Descriptive text for the item of the line.

type.description: Special type of the line. LINE is the default and designates regular item lines, credit memos create CREDIT_MEMO lines (which are distinguished so they are not copied to non-credit-memo documents), DUNNING_FEE is added when a dunning is created for the invoice. CASH_IN_CM and ON_ACCT designate lines of pre-payments to an invoice, which are subtracted from the total and not copied. OFFER_OPTION is a special type for offers only, to indicate that a line in the offer is optional.  OFFER_OPTION lines are not added to the total sum. TOTAL_DISCOUNT and TOTAL_SURCHARGE applies to all lines that are not ignored in total discount.

itemPrice.description: Item price of a single unit. Must be present if an item reference is not supplied.

itemPriceType.description: Determines it item price is net without tax (N) or total with tax (T). Must be present if an item reference is not supplied.

unitOfMeasure.description: Short code for unit type, see the /units_of_measure resource.

netPrice.description: Total net price of the line. Always required for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

taxPrice.description: Total tax amount of the line. Always required for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

totalPrice.description: Total price, including tax, of the line. Always required for verification, and must be the sum of net and tax price. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

remainingAmount.description: The remaining unpaid amount of the line, which is reduced for every payment, or zero when the document is fully paid. Only for invoices and credit memos.

discount.description: Optional discount amount, either as a total amount or a percentage (defined in discount mode). Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

discountMode.description: Determines whether discount is a total amount (CONSTANT) or a percentage (RATE). Must be set together with discount amount.

amount.description: The total item amount, i.e. number of units purchased. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

itemNumber.description: Item number, identification, or barcode. Is defaulted from the item when an item reference is supplied.

item.description: Item id, see the /items resource. When supplied with a valid item and item defaulting is enabled (default), then description, item net price, item number and unit of measure are defaulted, but can be overridden. Without defaulting, only the reference is saved, but no data from the item applied.

itemDefaulting.description: If not explicitly disabled, item data from a supplied item reference is defaulted for the line. When set to false, no data is defaulted and all fieldsmust be supplied in the request.

account.description: Account code for the income account for this line, see the /accounts resource. Defaulted with the item account, if defaulting is not disabled. Otherwise a valid account must be supplied.

taxClassEntry.description: Tax class entry code for the income account for this line, see the /accounts/{account}/tax_class_entries resource. Determines the tax rate and is defaulted with the item tax rate, if defaulting is not disabled. Otherwise, a valid tax class entry must be supplied.

BusinessDocumentLineDtoV1.description: List of all business document lines. The order of this array defines the numbers assigned to the lines.

id.description: Number of the business document. Will be automatically generated, unless EXTERNAL is set for the state - then it is a mandatory property. Must be unique.

uuid.description: Unique identifier of the business document.

description.description: Description of the business document to be printed after the subject. Defaulted with configured layout, unless the state is EXTERNAL.

date.description: Date of the invoice. Always required.

state.description: Determines the state after creation. STAGING leaves the document open for editing, FINALIZED completes it, EXTERNAL for invoices created outside of the application, which requires a number (id) and will not create a PDF or default any layout properties.

netAmount.description: Total net amount of the document. Must match the sum of all line net amounts if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

taxAmount.description: Total tax amount of the document. Must match the sum of all line tax amounts if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

totalAmount.description: Total amount of the document including tax. Must match the sum of all line totals if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

remainingAmount.description: Remaining, unpaid amount of the document (invoice or credit memo). Decreases with payments, 0 for paid documents.

currency.description: Currency code of the document, see the /currencies resource. Defaulted with EUR.

currencyRate.description: Currency rate of the document. Defaulted with 1.

referenceText.description: Reference info to other documents, business case information, remittance numbers, etc.

referenceDate.description: Optional reference date to another business case, transaction, etc.

footer.description: Description of the business document to be printed after the lines. Defaulted with configured layout, unless the state is EXTERNAL.

customer.description: ID of the customer, see the /customers resource.

customerName.description: Customer name, for when the customer doesn't have a record, or doesn't need one. Ignored if a customer id is set.

layoutSetup.description: ID of the layout to be used, seee the /layout_setups resource. Defaulted with configured default setup, if any, and ignored if the document state is not FINALIZED.

sequenceGroup.description: Sequence group id, for when a different sequence group is to be used besides the configured default group. See the /sequence_groups resource.

lines.description: List of all business document lines. The order of this array defines the numbers assigned to the lines.

additionalAddress.description: Additional address id, see the /customer/{customer}/additional_addresses resource. Sets an address besides the default to be used for this document.

normalizeRoundingErrors.description: Defines if rounding errors between the supplied document totals and lines should be corrected. If enabled, the supplied document totals will not be validated against the system-internal calculation. Instead, the supplied totals are taken as the actual invoice totals, and minor discrepancies (rounding errors) will be corrected in the totals of the last supplied document line to match the system calculation. Use this if your system calculates totals and rounds differently and you have trouble passing the validation. Enabling this will also disable the item price and amount validation against line totals.

deliveryFromDate.description: Delivery span. Defaulted with configured delivery date range setting.

deliveryToDate.description: Delivery span. Defaulted with configured delivery date range setting.

paidDate.description: Date the credit memo was fully cashed out.

paid.description: Marks if the credit memo is fully cashed out.

signed.description: Determines if the document is to be signed after finalization.

eInvoiceVersion.description: If e-invoice creation is configured, this property is mandatory and defines the e-invoice version.

layoutSetup.description: Layout setup id of the layout to use for the cancellation document PDF, see /layout_setups resource. Is defaulted with the configured default setup. Ignored for EXTERNAL type business documents.

cancellationDate.description: Date of cancellation, defaulted with today.

sequenceGroup.description: Sequence group id, for when a different sequence group is to be used besides the configured default group. See the /sequence_groups resource.

cancelType.description: Type of cancellation for the document. CANCELLATION (default) only cancels the document. For invoices, CANCELLATION_CREDIT_MEMO creates a positive credit memo, and CANCELLATION_INVOICE creates a negative cancellation invoice.

eInvoiceVersion.description: If e-invoice creation is configured, this property is mandatory and defines the e-invoice version.

currencyRate.description: Currency rate at time of payment. Defaulted with 1.

restType.description: Indicates if the unpaid amount should be flagged as complete (DISCOUNT, CORRECTION, UNCOLLECTABLE, ONACCOUNT, CREDIT_CASHED). Leave this property empty if no rest payment is to be made, i.e. this is a partial payment.

payingAccount.description: Account that received the payment, see the /accounts resource. Must be of the cash account type (U) and not be reserved (e.g. from a cash register). Either payingAccount or cashRegister must be supplied.

cashRegister.description: Cash register number that is to process the payment, see the /cash_registers resource. The test register (id 0) cannot be used. Either cashRegister or payingAccount must be supplied.

id.description: Number of the business document. Will be automatically generated, unless EXTERNAL is set for the state - then it is a mandatory property. Must be unique.

uuid.description: Unique identifier of the business document.

description.description: Description of the business document to be printed after the subject. Defaulted with configured layout, unless the state is EXTERNAL.

date.description: Date of the invoice. Always required.

state.description: Determines the state after creation. STAGING leaves the document open for editing, FINALIZED completes it, EXTERNAL for invoices created outside of the application, which requires a number (id) and will not create a PDF or default any layout properties.

netAmount.description: Total net amount of the document. Must match the sum of all line net amounts if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

taxAmount.description: Total tax amount of the document. Must match the sum of all line tax amounts if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

totalAmount.description: Total amount of the document including tax. Must match the sum of all line totals if document is FINALIZED or EXTERNAL for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

remainingAmount.description: Remaining, unpaid amount of the document (invoice or credit memo). Decreases with payments, 0 for paid documents.

currency.description: Currency code of the document, see the /currencies resource. Defaulted with EUR.

currencyRate.description: Currency rate of the document. Defaulted with 1.

referenceText.description: Reference info to other documents, business case information, remittance numbers, etc.

referenceDate.description: Optional reference date to another business case, transaction, etc.

footer.description: Description of the business document to be printed after the lines. Defaulted with configured layout, unless the state is EXTERNAL.

customer.description: ID of the customer, see the /customers resource.

customerName.description: Customer name, for when the customer doesn't have a record, or doesn't need one. Ignored if a customer id is set.

layoutSetup.description: ID of the layout to be used, seee the /layout_setups resource. Defaulted with configured default setup, if any, and ignored if the document state is not FINALIZED.

sequenceGroup.description: Sequence group id, for when a different sequence group is to be used besides the configured default group. See the /sequence_groups resource.

lines.description: List of all business document lines. The order of this array defines the numbers assigned to the lines.

additionalAddress.description: Additional address id, see the /customer/{customer}/additional_addresses resource. Sets an address besides the default to be used for this document.

normalizeRoundingErrors.description: Defines if rounding errors between the supplied document totals and lines should be corrected. If enabled, the supplied document totals will not be validated against the system-internal calculation. Instead, the supplied totals are taken as the actual invoice totals, and minor discrepancies (rounding errors) will be corrected in the totals of the last supplied document line to match the system calculation. Use this if your system calculates totals and rounds differently and you have trouble passing the validation. Enabling this will also disable the item price and amount validation against line totals.

completionDate.description: The date the delivery note was marked as delivered.

completionState.description: A completed delivery note has this state, being either IN_PREPARATION or DELIVERED.

completionDate.description: The date the document was completed. Defaulted with today.

completionState.description: The completion state to set. Allowed states are ACCEPTED and REJECTED for offers, IN_PROGRESS and DONE for order confirmations, and IN_PREPARATION and DELIVERED for delivery notes.

id.description: Id of the dunning level, automatically assigned.

description.description: The description for this dunning level.

documentSubject.description: The subject which is visible on the dunning document.

fixedFee.description: The fixed fee for this dunning level.

feePercentage.description: The fixed percentage for this dunning level.

dunningDays.description: From which day the next dunning is due.

previousLevel.description: The dunning level that comes before.

dunningLineText.description: The dunning text which is shown on the document.

account.description: The account to which the fees are posted

dunningEndText.description: The dunning text which is shown at the end on the document.

taxClassEntry.description: The tax rate with which the dunning is created

paymentTerm.description: Payment term id, see /payment_terms resource. Determines due date, dunning date, etc. and is defaulted with the configured default payment term, if any.

deliveryFromDate.description: Delivery span. Defaulted with configured delivery date range setting.

deliveryToDate.description: Delivery span. Defaulted with configured delivery date range setting.

signed.description: Determines if the document is to be signed after finalization.

paidDate.description: Date the invoice was fully paid.

paid.description: Marks if the invoice is fully paid.

dunningDate.description: Date of the last dunning made for non-payment of the invoice.

lastDunningLevel.description: Last dunning level issued for the invoice.

eInvoiceVersion.description: If e-invoice creation is configured, this property is mandatory and defines the e-invoice version.

completionDate.description: Date the order confirmation was marked as completed (either in progress and shipping or done).

completionState.description: Indicates if the order confirmation is IN_PROGRESS or DONE

id.description: ID of this payment term to be referenced in invoices, offers, and order confirmations.

description.description: Longer description of the payment term, not printed.

dueDays.description: Determines how many days are added to the invoice date to calculate the due date.

dunningDays.description: Determines how many days are added to the invoice date to calculate the dunning date.

defaultTerm.description: If true, this payment term is used by default in invoices.

id.description: ID to use in invoices and other business documents.

name.description: Readable name for this sequence group.

base.description: Annual sequences contain the year and are restarted with 1 at the beginning of every year. Permanent groups count up continuously.

defaultGroup.description: Indicates if this is the default group and used for business documents that have no group specified.

id.description: id of the item category

name.description: Name or title of the category.

code.description: Optional short code of the category to be displayed.

description.description: More expansive description, if needed.

unitOfMeasure.description: Short code of the unit type to default for items. See the /units_of_measure resource.

account.description: Account to default for items, see the /accounts resource.

taxClassEntry.description: Tax class entry to default for items, see the /accounts/{account}/tax_class_entries resource.

itemCount.description: Total number of items in this category.

color.description: Color code in HTML hex to be used in front-ends.

id.description: Uuid to be referenced in business document and receipt lines.

unitOfMeasure.description: short code for the amount unit of measure, see the /units_of_measure resource.

description.description: Longer description of the item, will be added to business document lines.

descriptionFormatted.description: Description pre-formatted and html-sanitized to readable text.

sellingPrice.description: Final selling price of the item, used for business document and receipt lines.

amountType.description: Indicates if the base price is net without tax (N) or total incl. tax (T).

weight.description: Weight of the item, if present. Unit of measure is not pre-determined and left to the user.

currency.description: Currency code of the item price, see the /currencies resource. Defaulted with EUR.

purchasePrice.description: Optional purchase price, part of the calculated total price.

margin.description: Optional margin price, part of the calculated total price.

marginMode.description: Indicates if the margin is net without tax (N) or total incl. tax (T).

additionalCharge.description: Optional additional charge, part of the calculated total price.

additionalChargeMode.description: Indicates if the additional charge is net without tax (N) or total incl. tax (T).

supplier.description: Supplier of the item, see the /suppliers resource.

calculatedNetPrice.description: Calculated net price of the item, based on its partial prices.

itemCategory.description: Item category, see the /item_categories resource. Optional, if no categories exist or are not needed.

itemCategoryDefaulting.description: If set to false (default), then account and tax rate are mandatory fields. If enabled, the tax rate and account are defaulted from the item category, unless values are set explicitly.

barCode.description: Optional bar code or scanner code of the item.

supplierOrderNumber.description: Optional number for the item number in the supplier's records.

account.description: Account of the item, see /accounts resource. Required if item category defaulting is not enabled.

taxClassEntry.description: Tax class entry of the item, see the /accounts/{account}/tax_class_entries resource. Required if item category defaulting is not enabled.

color.description: Color code in HTML hex to be used in front-ends.

id.description: UUID of the contact, automatically assigned.

addressBranchNo.description: Address branch number of the company, if present.

taxNumber.description: Tax number or UID number of the contact. May be used for matching the contact with document metadata for bookings.

salutationCode.description: Salutation code for a contact as person.

title.description: Title if the contact references a person.

firstName.description: First name if the contact references a person. Required unless a company name is supplied.

lastName.description: Last name if the contact references a person. Required unless a company name is supplied.

compSalutationCode.description: Salutation code for a contact as a company.

companyName.description: Company name for a company contact. Required unless a first and last name are supplied.

streetName.description: Street name of the address, excluding the number.

streetNumber.description: Street number of the address. May include special characters to designate floor etc.

emailAddress.description: E-mail address belonging to the contact.

ccEmailAddress.description: CC-email addresses (single or concatenated with semicolon) for the contact.

bccEmailAddress.description: BCC-email addresses (single or concatenated with semicolon) for the contact.

mobileNumber.description: Mobile number belonging to the contact.

telNumber.description: Telephone number belonging to the contact.

faxNumber.description: Fax number belonging to the contact.

skype.description: Skype user name belonging to the contact.

description.description: Short description or note belonging to he contact.

webAddress.description: Web address belonging to the contact.

attribute1.description: Client-defined custom attribute. Can be freely renamed or used.

attribute2.description: Client-defined custom attribute. Can be freely renamed or used.

attribute3.description: Client-defined custom attribute. Can be freely renamed or used.

attribute4.description: Client-defined custom attribute. Can be freely renamed or used.

attribute5.description: Client-defined custom attribute. Can be freely renamed or used.

noVatNumber.description: Determines if the contact is not a company (no UID tax). Defaulted to false.

country.description: Country code of the address. See the /countries resource for all available countries and their codes. Defaulted to AT.

region.description: Region code of the address, depending on country. See the /countries/{country}/regions resource for all available regions and their codes.

accountOwner.description: Account owner of the bank account belonging to this contact.

bankName.description: Bank institution name of the bank account belonging to this contact.

bankBranchNumber.description: Bank branch number of the bank account belonging to this contact.

accountNumber.description: Account number of the bank account belonging to this contact.

bic.description: BIC of the bank account belonging to this contact.

iban.description: IBAN of the bank account belonging to this contact. May be used for matching the contact with document metadata for bookings.

defaultAccount.description: Account code for the default account, see /accounts resource. Will be used as default for new incoming/outgoing invoices with the contact.

defaultTaxClassEntry.description: Tax class entry code for the default tax class, see /accounts/{account}/tax_class_entries resource. Will be used as default for new incoming/outgoing invoices with the contact.

defaultInvoiceAddress.description: Additional address id for the default address to use for invoices.

defaultDeliveryAddress.description: Additional address id for the default address to use for delivery notes.

contraAccount.description: Account code for the (unpaid) contra account, see the /account resource. will be used for new incoming/outgoing invoices in double-entry accounting. If createContraAccount is set, this code determines the account code that will be assigned to the created contra account.

createContraAccount.description: If true, a new contra account will be created, optionally with a specified code (contraAccount). If customer/supplier has a contra account already set, no contra account will be created. Double-entry accounting only.

customerNumber.description: Custom number for the customer. If autonumbering is enabled, this property is ignored and the number will be generated.

mySupplierNumber.description: Number or identifier the customer assigned to your client.

gln.description: Global location number of the customer.

duns.description: Data Universal Numbering System (DUNS) number of the customer.

otherIdentifier.description: Optional third-party identifier not covered by other properties.

dunningStop.description: Indicates if the customer is not to be dunned. If set, the reason must be set as well.

dunningStopReason.description: Reason for the dunning stop. Mandatory if dunning stop is set.

defaultDunningLevel.description: Default dunning level, if the customer is to be dunned. See the /dunning_levels resource.

defaultPaymentTerm.description: Default payment term to be used with invoices for this customer. See the /payment_terms resource.

discount.description: Optional discount percentage for this customer. Can be used in invoicing, but is not automatically applied when using the API.

id.description: UUID which identifies this instance of an address.

identifier.description: Human-readable identifier to label this address.

addressType.description: Determines whether this address is an invoice address, delivery address, or both (default).

title.description: Human-readable title, like Dr., if the address references a person.

firstName.description: First name if the address references a person.

lastName.description: Last name if the address references a person.

streetName.description: Street name of the address, excluding the number.

streetNumber.description: Street number of the address. May include special characters to designate floor etc.

country.description: Country code of the address. See the /countries resource for all available countries and their codes. Defaulted to AT.

region.description: Region code of the address, depending on country. See the /countries/{country}/regions resource for all available regions and their codes.

addressBranchNo.description: Address branch number of the company, if present.

emailAddress.description: E-mail address belonging to the contact of this address.

copyEmailAddress.description: E-mail address to which a copy of all correspondence should be sent (CC or BCC).

copyEmailType.description: Copy type when a copy e-mail address is set (CC or BCC). Defaults to BCC.

telNumber.description: Telephone number belonging to the contact of this address.

faxNumber.description: Fax number belonging to the contact of this address.

mobileNumber.description: Mobile number belonging to the contact of this address.

skype.description: Skype user name belonging to the contact of this address.

webAddress.description: Web address belonging to the contact, or the branch address.

description.description: Short description or note belonging to this address.

salutationCode.description: Salutation code for a contact as person.

contraAccount.description: Account code that should be used for the new contra account. Must not be used already, see the /accounts resource.

id.description: UUID of the contact, automatically assigned.

addressBranchNo.description: Address branch number of the company, if present.

taxNumber.description: Tax number or UID number of the contact. May be used for matching the contact with document metadata for bookings.

salutationCode.description: Salutation code for a contact as person.

title.description: Title if the contact references a person.

firstName.description: First name if the contact references a person. Required unless a company name is supplied.

lastName.description: Last name if the contact references a person. Required unless a company name is supplied.

compSalutationCode.description: Salutation code for a contact as a company.

companyName.description: Company name for a company contact. Required unless a first and last name are supplied.

streetName.description: Street name of the address, excluding the number.

streetNumber.description: Street number of the address. May include special characters to designate floor etc.

emailAddress.description: E-mail address belonging to the contact.

ccEmailAddress.description: CC-email addresses (single or concatenated with semicolon) for the contact.

bccEmailAddress.description: BCC-email addresses (single or concatenated with semicolon) for the contact.

mobileNumber.description: Mobile number belonging to the contact.

telNumber.description: Telephone number belonging to the contact.

faxNumber.description: Fax number belonging to the contact.

skype.description: Skype user name belonging to the contact.

description.description: Short description or note belonging to he contact.

webAddress.description: Web address belonging to the contact.

attribute1.description: Client-defined custom attribute. Can be freely renamed or used.

attribute2.description: Client-defined custom attribute. Can be freely renamed or used.

attribute3.description: Client-defined custom attribute. Can be freely renamed or used.

attribute4.description: Client-defined custom attribute. Can be freely renamed or used.

attribute5.description: Client-defined custom attribute. Can be freely renamed or used.

noVatNumber.description: Determines if the contact is not a company (no UID tax). Defaulted to false.

country.description: Country code of the address. See the /countries resource for all available countries and their codes. Defaulted to AT.

region.description: Region code of the address, depending on country. See the /countries/{country}/regions resource for all available regions and their codes.

accountOwner.description: Account owner of the bank account belonging to this contact.

bankName.description: Bank institution name of the bank account belonging to this contact.

bankBranchNumber.description: Bank branch number of the bank account belonging to this contact.

accountNumber.description: Account number of the bank account belonging to this contact.

bic.description: BIC of the bank account belonging to this contact.

iban.description: IBAN of the bank account belonging to this contact. May be used for matching the contact with document metadata for bookings.

defaultAccount.description: Account code for the default account, see /accounts resource. Will be used as default for new incoming/outgoing invoices with the contact.

defaultTaxClassEntry.description: Tax class entry code for the default tax class, see /accounts/{account}/tax_class_entries resource. Will be used as default for new incoming/outgoing invoices with the contact.

defaultInvoiceAddress.description: Additional address id for the default address to use for invoices.

defaultDeliveryAddress.description: Additional address id for the default address to use for delivery notes.

contraAccount.description: Account code for the (unpaid) contra account, see the /account resource. will be used for new incoming/outgoing invoices in double-entry accounting. If createContraAccount is set, this code determines the account code that will be assigned to the created contra account.

createContraAccount.description: If true, a new contra account will be created, optionally with a specified code (contraAccount). If customer/supplier has a contra account already set, no contra account will be created. Double-entry accounting only.

supplierNumber.description: Custom number for the supplier. If autonumbering is enabled, this property is ignored and the number will be generated.

myCustomerNumber.description: Number or identifier the supplier assigned to your client.

id.description: Cash register number, which must be unique.

name.description: Human-readable name of the cash register.

group.description: Optional, freely defined register group, for example by payment method or branch office.

state.description: NEW indicates a new cash register that can be freely edited and is not active. ACTIVE are cash registers ready to accept receipts and are read-only except for a few properties. LOCKED registers have been decommissioned and cannot be used. TEST designates a freely usable test cash register, which is automatically created.

currentBalance.description: Current total balance of the register. Cannot drop below zero.

allowPastIncome.description: Receipts are usually created with the current date and time. If this is enabled, backdating receipts is allowed, and a date/time can be supplied on receipt creation. This is useful when receipts are created by hand for mobile workers and registered afterwards. Dating a receipt before the last receipt in the cash register is prohibited regardless of this setting.

enableDrawback.description: When this is enabled, all front-ends of the cash register are supposed to activate the cashback feature, i.e. display the amount of currency returned to the customer on overpayment.

defaultRegister.description: Indicates if this is the default cash register to use in frontends.

bankAccountId.description: Bank account id for the cash payment account, see the /bank_accounts resource. Note that bank_accounts refers to payment accounts, which can also be cash, Paypal, or others.

lastReceiptDateTime.description: Date and time of the last added receipt

description.description: Human-readable name of the layout.

layoutPrintType.description: Defines the type of the layout, being either types for printers (like A4) or special receipt printer types.

displaySubject.description: Subject line for the regular receipt.

cancelDisplaySubject.description: Subject line for the cancellation receipt.

positionLogo.description: Relative position of the logo (top image).

positionHeader.description: Relative position of the header text.

positionFooter.description: Relative position of the footer text.

backgroundColor.description: Color of the background in HTML hex.

fontColor.description: Color of the font in HTML hex.

fontType.description: Font family, like ARIAL or COURIER.

header.description: Header text printed at the top of the page.

preLinesText.description: Text printed after the subject and before the receipt lines.

postLinesText.description: Text printed after the receipt lines.

footer.description: Footer text printed at the bottom of the page.

logo.description: Base64-encoded image to be printed at the top.

amountType.description: For receipts printed on a printer with limited space (Star printer), this property determines if either the net or total price of a line should be printed on the receipt.

printDiscount.description: Defines if detailed discount information should be printed on the receipt.

id.description: Date of the daily closing, unique.

creationDate.description: Timestamp of the creation date of this daily closing.

state.description: State of the daily closing. Once FINALIZED or BOOKED, no further receipts are possible.

openingBalance.description: Balance of the cash register at time of opening.

closingBalance.description: Balance of the cash register at the time of finalizing the daily closing.

incomeCount.description: Number of income receipts at the time of closing.

rebookCount.description: Number of rebook receipts at the time of closing.

otherCount.description: Number of special receipts, like monthly and yearly closing receipts, at the time of closing.

totalCount.description: Total number of receipts at the time of closing.

incomeNet.description: Net amount of all income receipts in this daily closing.

incomeTax.description: Tax amount of all income receipts in this daily closing.

incomeTotal.description: Total amount of all income receipts in this daily closing.

rebookTotal.description: Total amount of all rebook receipts in this daily closing.

monthlyClosing.description: Indicates if this closing also closes the month. Once a month is closed, no further receipts can be registered for it. Is done automatically to the last closing of a month when a closing for the next month is opened.

yearlyClosing.description: Indicates if this closing also closes the year. Once a year is closed, no further receipts can be registered for it. Is done automatically to the last closing of a year when a closing for the next year is opened.

closingBalance.description: The daily closing balance as provided by the API or calculated. Must match the backend closing balance for confirmation.

totalCount.description: The daily total receipt count as provided by the API or calculated. Must match the backend closing balance for confirmation.

subject.description: Subject of the Email to be sent

content.description: Content of the Email to be sent
content.example: This Mail contains the annual receipt sum

ccCopyEmailAddress.description: Email addresses mentioned in the CC, separated by semicolons ;

bccCopyEmailAddress.description: Email addresses mentioned in the BCC, separated by semicolons ;

dispositionNotification.description: Whether the mail uses a disposition notification header or not

attachVcard.description: Whether to attach a vCard or not

defaultFlag.description: Whether this template is the default template that is chosen if no other template is supplied

documentType.description: The document type of this template

id.description: Sequence number of the receipt, will be set automatically.

type.description: Type of the receipt. Only INCOME and REBOOK are valid for creating receipts, other types are created automatically.

dateTime.description: Date and time of the receipt, defaulted to the current time.

creationDateTime.description: Creation date and time of the receipt, will be set automatically.

customer.description: Customer id, see the /customers resource. If no customer name or id is provided, this receipt counts as cash sale. Only for income receipts.

customerName.description: Customer name, assigned automatically from the customer if the customer id is set. Otherwise, it can be defined freely.

customerMail.description: Customer e-mail address. If provided, an e-mail will be sent with the receipt PDF. Omit if no e-mail is wanted.

customerMailSent.description: Only set when a customerMail was requested. Indicates if the mail transfer was successful - a failed transfer will not raise an API error, as the receipt will be saved in either case.

additionalAddress.description: Additional address id, see the /customer/{customer}/additional_addresses resource. Sets an address besides the default to be used for this receipt.

referenceDate.description: Optional reference date referring to the date of an invoice or receipt.

referenceText.description: Optional reference to an invoice or other receipt.

totalAmount.description: Total amount of the receipt. It must match the total line sum of the receipt. Maximum of 10 digits and 2 fractional digits.

cancelReceipt.description: Sequence number of the cancel receipt. Only for cancelled receipts.

originalReceipt.description: Sequence number of the original receipt, if this receipt is a cancel receipt.

toAccount.description: Account that the amount is transferred to, see the /accounts resource. Must be of the cash account type (U). Only valid for REBOOK receipt types, for which either this or fromAccount is set.

fromAccount.description: Account that the amount is transferred from, see the /accounts resource. Must be of the cash account type (U).  Only valid for REBOOK receipt types, for which either this or toAccount is set.

description.description: Rebook description. Only valid for REBOOK receipt types.

qrCode.description: QR code of the receipt as string representation, if present (RKSV)

lines.description: Receipt lines for INCOME type receipts.

textAfterLines.description: Optional text after lines, for example when referencing an invoice.

mailTemplate.description: The ID of the mail template that should be used for sending an email

userFullName.description: The name of the user that registered the receipt.

id.description: Automatically assigned line number.

itemNumber.description: Item number, is defaulted if an item is set.

item.description: Item id, see the /items resource. Defaults name, description, account, tax class entry, item price, item number and unit of measure.

itemName.description: Name of the item for this line. Is defaulted if an item is set.

itemDescription.description: Extended description of the item for this line. Is defaulted if an item is set.

itemPrice.description: Single item price. Is defaulted if item is set.

itemPriceType.description: Determine if the item price is net without tax (N) or total including tax (T). Is defaulted if an item is set.

unitOfMeasure.description: Short code for unit type, see the /units_of_measure resource. Is defaulted if an item is set.

netPrice.description: Line total net price. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

taxPrice.description: Line total tax price. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

totalPrice.description: Line total price, always required in API calls for verification. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

discount.description: Discount in total or as percentage, must be set together with discount mode. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

discountMode.description: Indicates if the discount is total (CONSTANT) or a percentage (RATE). Must be set together with discount.

amount.description: Total item amount, defaulted with 1. Maximum of 10 digits and 5 fractional digits.

account.description: Account code to use, see the /accounts resource. Is defaulted if an item is set.

taxClassEntry.description: Tax class entry code for the account, determining the tax rate. See the /accounts/{account}/tax_class_entries resource. Is defaulted if an item is set.

note.description: Optional internal note which is not printed.

ReceiptLineDtoV1.description: Receipt lines for INCOME type receipts.

month.description: Month of the grouped receipt. Only present with MONTH and DAY reporting type.

day.description: Day of the grouped receipt. Only present with DAY reporting type.

itemName.description: Name of the item the receipt is grouped for.

incomeNet.description: Net sum (after taxes) in the grouped receipt

incomeTotal.description: Total amount of income cash in the grouped receipt

itemAmount.description: Amount of items in the grouped receipt

itemUom.description: Unit of measure of the item

month.description: Month of the grouped receipt. Only present with MONTH and DAY reporting type.

day.description: Day of the grouped receipt. Only present with DAY reporting type.

incomeNet.description: Net sum (before taxes) of all income receipts.

incomeTax.description: Tax sum of all income receipts.

incomeTotal.description: Total amount of all income receipts.

month.description: Month of the grouped receipt. Only present with MONTH and DAY reporting type.

day.description: Day of the grouped receipt. Only present with DAY reporting type.

endUserFirstName.description: First name of the user the receipt was grouped for

endUserLastName.description: Last name of the user the receipt was grouped for

incomeNet.description: Net sum (after taxes) in the grouped receipt

incomeTotal.description: Total amount of income cash in the grouped receipt

rebookTotal.description: Total amount of rebooked cash in the grouped receipt

mailTemplate.description: The ID of the mail template that should be used for sending an email

id.description: Id for this trip

description.description: Description for the trip

totalPrice.description: Calculated total price for this trip

currency.description: Currency, see the /currency resource. Defaulted with the main currency.

waypointCounter.description: How many waypoints are registered with this trip.

transferred.description: Indicates if the trip was booked. A booked trip can't be changed unless the booking is cancelled first.

id.description: Id

horizontalAccuracy.description: Represents the radius of the margin of error of the measurement

speedAccuracy.description: Matching speed and accuracy during machining

id.description: Id for this vehicle.

description.description: Description for this vehicle

vehicleEnteredDate.description: Vehicle entered date for this vehicle

vehicleRetiredDate.description: Vehicle retired date for this vehicle

languageRegion.description: Optional specific locale for region formatting.
